products.title: Limoges Blackout Pumice Roller Blind
products.description: Earthy and natural, this stony roller has a certain warmth and cosines you wouldnt usually expect from a grey. The organic tint to the fabric gives it more of a taupe shade than pure grey, lending it a homely feel. Its the perfect way to warm an otherwise crisp modern spa earthy and natural, this stony roller has a certain warmth and cosines you wouldnt usually expect from a grey.

products.title: Pumice Oyster Roller Blind
products.description: Sleek, sophisticated and superb style, the pumice oyster roller blind has plenty of contemporary appeal.
